title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Mozambique 2024
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: In general GDP growth compared to previous year has stayed the same over the Year.
GDP growth compared to previous year is roughly constant from 2017 to 2019, gradually increasing from 2019 to 2020, and lastly roughly constant from 2020 to 2021.
The line drastically increased by 3.4 times from Year 2019 to 2020.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2019 and 2020.
The highest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 6.04 was reached at Year 2020
The lowest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 1.8 was reported at Year 2019
min_summary: In general GDP growth compared to previous year has stayed the same over the Year.

mid_summary: Overall GDP growth compared to previous year has increased over the Year.

max_summary: Overall GDP growth compared to previous year has increased over the Year.
GDP growth compared to previous year is roughly constant from 2017 to 2019, gradually increasing from 2019 to 2020, and lastly roughly constant from 2020 to 2021.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2019 and 2020.
The highest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 6.04 was reached at Year 2020
The lowest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 1.8 was reported at Year 2019
The line significantly increased by 4.24 from Year 2019 to 2020.
